subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VX006-9k3N7lW5tlK4Q5cFHFMW2H1VMy5Gq9vLN20xtw85n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3lZW96gWR73dDCNsN1RYJ6WgtmZsV8-t1q5B8j6gW3Jvs824bNvPsVbYpSV8FfV3kW6PlbhD19f0wJW1JMNl36s24YXW5BTVhl6c_Dz2W420sHb8nZPtCW25QxBs2JyBldW8G00gt6VNHgZV6smfJ9hGsC9N4RL3MVJgcg1W35FW3T8v-kwqW4PGwyN38YdC_Vhdn1F29DHc9W7VF3ZF6ZvHk9W1VShph8hJ7G-W8CjGpG6HpLrjW8DS2xk16jPTBW6Xgd-n2JjGkVW6L36rH7jvC7BW4xDTmT6pKhjrW8lxnpq5VDk2-W6QxyhX3xZdvzW1B05d_1zQh4GW8Ds30P5sWd1FM1FY07KC2l1W62CY5b6B5KX2W8ZSlwP3KsKHmW4nYHjL5byV_BW2wYFw96WwtvHW5RZ4dK7mRqHyW4M_-Vx8XdjcBW162hLs1hvqgSW1fTt0R1zhWjDW6DpyRB5V3BbdW8wbG7w1D4yCFDMcmhrzPPdM3FY_sW3k9tW7Bbds-7Gl9jtW7w8_V35JyxNkf6nk6pF04 )



Hey Atto,

The Black Friday to Cyber Monday marathon is in full swing! As you power through one of the busiest weekends of the year, here’s a quick roundup of what’s new from Athos Commerce.

This week brings a global A–Z guide to 70+ fashion marketplaces, new on-demand guidance for boosting product discovery, and the latest thinking in Grow 25: Volume 4. Plus, updates on enhanced pinning, TikTok Shop, and a standout Paul Smith case study.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team



Featured This Week

? Ebook | A–Z Guide to 70+ Fashion Marketplaces Driving Reach and Revenue (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VX006-9k3N7lW5tlK4Q5cFHFMW2H1VMy5Gq9vLN20xttH5n4LbW50kH_H6lZ3pPW3D002g4ljzB2W3Ns6TD9hjXHNW7HtXfX62krH3W34v0495727s9W29h8bX2f7f_4N7p4TsdssW9DW5yK7ff78Rbb1Vnz8LK5Jjl1wVdZ6M37GNMHTW5HZNmt7vRpHfW35TnR192Q6NLW40RBD25KLK2bN5pFT3Hhn7tBW1_dj0s8k9_hwW30Xk4941kKYhW1rk_CM81tgcnW6gYrNQ55H483Vs7q7N83P4_gW1Bhvcl7yThG5W2_21_797xtkPW4YRw2w8DY_JWW9dw7Mx14x39pW4csrkS4cCp7CW8XX6N71wwxXRW2jysGh2jBmYBW4HDtsF2n4NRJW83LzFQ3JdQS2W2pmfbB81K9fwW82m1xL6yZ3m8W1qCByg30BNVRW56-PmZ62KQRTN11l_cBbsxM0f3thtQl04 )

Discover 70+ fashion marketplaces worldwide with insights, trends, and strategies to expand reach, revenue, and global growth.
